title: Fairy Bad Day
description: MY LIFE SERIOUSLY COULDN'T GET ANY WORSE.First, my righful designation of dragon slayer is STOLEN right from under my nose by Curtis Green. Sure, he's really cute, but that doesn't give him an excuse. ON TOP OF THAT, I AM ASSIGNED TO SLAY FAIRIES. I KNOW what you're thinking - how hard could it be, right? Wrong! These menacing beasts with their tiny hipster clothes and mocking sarcasm love taunting me. And they won't STOP!BUT THE THING THAT TOPS MY LIST OF STUFF TO RUIN MY day? That would be the GIANT KILLER FAIRY that I have to hunt down and slay because I am the only one who can see it.There is someone who can help me. Unfortunately ... it's Curtis.IT'S GOING TO BE A FAIRY BAD DAY.
author: Amanda Ashby
